title: YASUO NEW SKIN 2019 - SHADOW RONIN

embed.description: Post with 1 votes and 1 views. Tagged with league of legends, lol, yasuo; Shared by SKXXII. YASUO SHADOW RONIN - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS - BY SKXXII

body:
Yasuo skin with a light blue & black effects (shadows) plus a shining Jonin Armour and kasa hat (straw hat)

i created this fanart hope u like it

if u want another size it can be + text

replies.body:
Ooh yes we love a spooky samurai! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Very nice and op skin but i have another idea for new Yasuo skin. Thunderwind Yasuo or Lightingwind Yasuo. Normal Yasuo skin but with a lot of electricity. For example in 1,2 Q parts Yasuo hit te enemy and a big lighting from the sword goes through the enemy/enemies. But best ex. would be at the ult {you know Yasuo hits the enemy 3 times in ult and the third is the one which deals damage} the third hit when the damage applies , a big lighting or thunder to hit the enemy from up and make a big electricity waves around the enemy when it goes down on the ground. Hope you like the idea cuz as i imagined and desined a little bit the skin , would be great. Oh and to be a Legendary one.

Pls no yasuo skins. Too many people play this champ and i hate to play with or against this champ. 

The artwork is great.
this is an idea for yasuo... got other ideas for other champs, for example a firecracker for zoe
ultimate appears a thunder from the sky
